live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35341.summary: Some customers in the Westwood Lake Park area of Nanaimo are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35341.title: Mar 25 – Nanaimo (Westwood Lake Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
